title: Web Applications Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at NFB in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process after first phone call was technical assessment or live coding, the interviewer was outside of organization as consultant and he was supportive during the live code challenge. after that there was two more interview with the organization decision maker boards and at last with the organization president and during that interview I got the job offer.
Interview Questions: Question about version control (Git), my background with PHP frameworks and level of understanding the PHP language and the projects that previously I have worked with using LAMP stack.

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at NFB (Austin, TX) in Jun 2009
Interview Descriptions: Very professional, laid back work environment, friendly staff. The staff was very accepting of me and I did not feel out of place since most of the staff there already had a disability similar to mine, or just a disability. I enjoyed my time there, as an intern and wish I could have accepted the full time position.
Interview Questions: How can you help the company?
